Blog.post: Wanna apologise to cmay 1st...sorrie...though it wasnt only my fault...but still...sorrie 4 keeping u alone the whole day....din go skul today...ears paining was the excuse i used...but it’s oso kind of the reason...went skul in the aft...for pol...not really feel like goin but it’s better than staying at home...dunno y...i dun really like my hse...except my room...my own world...not really in fact...but frens like comin...weird...i prefer theirs...went to pol class to sit for the so called exam...i did it badly...i guess they din do it well too...we were busy playin cteng’s new 6230...it’s not really new...she bought it for quite some time liao...juz bcoz of some so called technical prob she only started to use it this week...we took pics after the exam...me n mjie’s...tcher’s...cteng’s...haha tcher’s pic so so so damn fat...mjie’s and mine was the nicest (bhb...) haha...we din go home after the class...mjie chia ice cream...mmm...damn nice...then took 240’s bus to cteng’s hse...it was our 1st time taking this bus...but cteng was the most nervous among all...she like sua ba (dun angry)...haha...like travelling...haha....mjie wanna on9 lo...wanna go visit the so called interesting fridae...wonder wat so nice bout the fridae...cteng too had a crush on it...is it really tat interesting??? I wondered...i went there once n dun even feel like visitin it for the second time...sigh...for both of u le...let the bygone b the bygone...the past can be kept as sweet or bitter memories...not like wat cteng says...i pei si les...juz tat i think u all din born to b liddat...y make urself so les...u noe wat i mean...mayb i was wrong...but i really dun understand u all...mjie esp...coz u never talk to us bout all this...i mean to cmay n me...we r willing to listen as a fren...but u only tell cteng n not us...both of us were juz as if outsiders, whom dunno anythin bout u...Ok fine then...sorrie if anyhtin i said hurts...it’s juz my op...hope u dun mind... phone rang...the stupid digi fella called n he even called me a mr!!! Stupid idiot... saw a lot pics in cteng’s com...damn ugly man....twah miss called...they really like to do this...but still better than the csiang...call every 5 min but dun speak...twah's call reminds me of thurs...when he sms to explain bout the canteen day thing...haha...so funny of him...i was juz teasing him n he took it serious...haha...so innocent... then go eat dua cha wif cteng n mjie at 1st...cling n chui joined us later...saw cteng’s cousin...hairstyle look somewat like nick’s from the back...so nice the food...n so long never sit n eat together...perhaps never...went back quite late...cling drove us home...some prob wif her driving skill....haha...but quite steady oso...compare to cteng...hahaha...cant imagine how her driving skill will b....bro is out again...fine then...not big matter to me...wow...so tired.... nth special at nite...play sms wif someone...kinda sien but he’s indeed a good listener...thanks him alot...for chatting wif me when i feel boring...tat dino miss called....wonder y guys like playing missed calls...i tot it was gals’ stuff??? Ok fine then...din c him for quite some time liao...since last year i think...neway v r still frens...still....chien juz miss called...but i cant catch...yarr i m kinda lembab at this... ooo...so sleepy...k till here...nitez....zzzZZZ...

today sharn n her gang not here again...they really kut lak wan...cant help...rajin ppl mmg liddat...cmay brought lots pics we took on tue...some of them really cute le....but kinda blur...n some ///...haha mjie got one cross eye wan...others wan all okok lo...not really tat nice...blur wan nicer...meng long mei...yarr...really.....mjie n cteng show the pics they took in lyen’s hse...so the not nice...haha....can c those pimples++...ptian act quite pretty...when not smiling...like jlene...so they better keep their mouth shut...haha...the only one wif sharn so blur...cteng sumo say like hotdog...hmmp...hee act i oso kinda agree wan...but still pretty....wonder y she dun like to take pics....bsiew n others wan normal lo...but abit blur so seem abnormal lo...haha... hchee told she nonit wear scarf though got caught....wif tat illogical reason she could escape...chey...stupid lee...but i lg stupid la...liddat oso scant think of...act tot of earlier liao but i tot smart ppl like lee will not blive wan ma...manatau she so afraid of parents wan...useless.... nvm la...later longer d only cut la...can change style ma...act afraid of wearin scarf oso kind of the reason...wateva.... stay back 4 pol...kononnyer...sit for the so called exam...but not even half hour then finish liao...simply tembak wan...since all ob...watever la...not important oso....the tcher oso fell asleep liao...haha so cute...then she ask to buy sweet...so i bought the damn sour wan for her...n ice cream for myself...ct still doin the test...wonder wat takes her so long...after tat revise physics...cmay really damn geng le...all oso she noe but her explaination kinda cct...then eat lots junk food...until stomach oso goin to burst liao....but the food all very nice le...mijie play piano while cteng n cmay went to refill water...she play so nice...really admire her skill of playing piano...cteng too...but she make it really obvious tat mjie so happy...haha...learn kinda lots...coz if stay at home oso sleep wan le...liddat group study better...can play oso...more relax... show mom pics tat we took...she say cmay so sao ga...haha...if she heard then sure angry till dunno like wat liddat...haha... saw hling’s letter...she reply so fast till i oso felt kinda bu hao yi si for replyin so late...she talk bout twah n his gang too...wonder y everybody noes them n they knew i kenal them wan...so sia sueh...they ask like got wat liddat...she said their gang esp twah n csheng very popular wan...pop for lengchai...walao...so wai sui...yarr...they mmg kinda good looking....she oso say tat she heard tat csheng got gf liao...really is tat bk gal his frens told me...she sumo say cute cute wan...can imagine...he sure like tat kind kawaii wan la...haha...again cmay got disappointed liao...dunno she still got feel anot...but nvm la since he not good wan...sat mong anot?? Haha...nvm la...still got lots chai outside...nonit sat mong...but i think she mayb oso forget who’s csheng edy...i oso forget his look liao...coz only met him twice...face black black + alot pimples wan...haha...muz tok him more...since everybody oso say his att not good wan....k le wan study liao.....gambatte....

Today tat stupid lee say nonit to wear the so called scarf liao...yahoooo...but the norcbai seemed to b kinda unhappy...she mmg kan wo bu shun yan wan la...wateva...i m not bothered...haha...finally image rebuilt...but cant spike nemore...though it would look kinda nurdy...but still better than wearing scarf...yarr....ohya...next week monthly test le...not prepared at all...no mood to study...dun care la test only wat...but still kinda stress...coz sharn...jlene...ptian...xyee...ylin they all so pok meng...so many days din go skul liao...kononnya study...but i think they really study at home wan... not like us...me i mean...ponteng oso cant study at home wan...we’ll only on9 n sleep...cmay wun la...most probably me, cteng n mjie only...but mjie cant on9...so kesian...but she still busy wif the chinese society thing...t-shirt...camp...alot more...got position mmg diff abit wan... sigh...eng time damn boring le...watching the so called interestin sketch...the drover’s wife kononnyer...dunno wat the hell they acting....but still i think will b better than ours...though boring but i think the renuka kinda enjoy... after skul stay back...to take pic kononnyer...but act i myself dun feel like goin home le...so sien...sure sleep again wan...later bcome fat pig liao...so stay wif cmay n cteng...act mjie staying wif us wan but at last she chose to go meeting...we took pics around skul...at pwtc...library...doin the so called gotong royong...padahal playing the fool there...jnice n lpeng seemed to b really interested in cmay’s cam...beria-ia wanna take pics 4 us...padahal hey themselves wanna take....cmay left us to tution....after 'struggling' 4 some time finally we decided to go kp to meet cteng’s mom...went there by bus...wanna play pool act but kene halau by the malay fella...saying skul uniforms r not allowed...so damn sia sueh...sigh...sia sueh things alwiz happen (esp. when i m wif her...) the way to the main door bcome long long journey....can feel those malays sitting there teasing us in heart.... then ma go bowling lo...we played damn cha...till the malay bside us beh tahan liao...muz teach us some techniques to play...though he quite pro wan...but cteng after his teaching still the same...haha..but she still won...happy anot?? Haha...later go da gei...saw a so called yao yeng guy playing the somewat like dancing machine....hehe...-_-’’’...bhb....play motobike...etc...only i think...coz alot money got eaten by tat stupid machine...saw alot toms...wear liddat...in pinafore i mean....damn sia sueh....but act the whole day quite fun wan...so long never go wet liddat liao lo...then eat sweet corn...nyam nyam damn nice le....met her mom finally...so sexy...spag+white pants...so slim legs...wow...then her mom drove me home... at nite wanna study act...but too tired...so holding the kimia book n fell asleep....it’s alredi 11 sth when i woke up....waiting 4 the same old lame day to approach....sigh....life sux....exam suxer....haha...worse i mean...

wat a sueh day....got caught by tat stupid lee xxxx xxxx....saying my hair is too short n ask to wear the scarf all over again...it’s the 2nd time since i 1st cut this hairstyle...yet i tot i could escape...haih...so sueh...got caught again...laughed by ppl...esp tat malay gal...haha...she ejek me n got scolded by tat lee...padan muka...laugh sumo la...tat time kinda song but still i hate tat lee...she’s like aiming me liddat...mayb i prasan or wat...she prejudice on me liddat...fine...hate her yet afraid of her...today almost wearing the stupid white so called scarf n not tudung the whole day...image vanished...study(not really) in scary the whole day...scared to met the lee n nor cbai...as she hate me...i could feel it...mayb bcoz i m a chinese gua...malays mmg so kns wan...esp those like her...oh ya...reminds me of last fri...sten said go cut hair together next time...i agreed but now muz consider 1st...k enuff bout those stupid tchers...... kimia time do peka eksp...tot it’ll b hard...coz dun understand when i read myself at home...after taught by cmay then damn clear liao...cmay so geng...pui fok pui fok...luckily the eksp so successful...mjie listen to tcher until wan sleep liao...blur blur look haha...so funny but quite cute oso la act...haha...tat time eng class time wan lg funny...scolded by sara...not scold act...should say embarassed by sara...she said i asking 4 trouble...k fine...even though i m...it’s none of ur business k??? hehe...i only gan nu bu gan yan...if i dare i would hv say it in front of her juz now... waiting for the impunctual 251...saw someone like csheng in the 126’s bus...not sure...so long never see him d...but nth oso...coz not close to him...dowan either...heard twah say he kinda guai lan...fine nvm...dun fren him...fan zheng he oso not tat leng chai...like the class pic...haha...cmay sure very sat mong...tat time she so beria-ia wan to noe him...asked 4 num sumo...now c he got so many pimples then dowan edy lo...yi mao qu ren wan...nvm le...dun hv the so called leng chai (i mean in pic) then only can concentrate in studying ma...better...though i noe u wun b influenced by all this thing...tegas enuff...like me...haha...kinda bhb...i noe...better than mjie...so easy terpengaruh wan...but now i think there’s nth can influence her d...she cant on9...cant call...no chai (lui i mean) nth to b worried bout d...this monthly test sure can get flying colours liao lo...jia you le...i no mood to study le...xyee’s gang not coming to skul tomorrow....sharn only i wanna emphasize act...sigh...line up alone again...nobody help to kap the lee idiot liao...wonder y they so rajin wan...it’s only a test rite??? life is to enjoy~~ yea..finally bus came...heard someone screaming out my name...wonder who’s tat sua ba...so suprised...saw my so called sis...nick i mean...she yelling my name n waving her hand...i bye to her by waving hand too(but not as kua as she did)...haha...juz kidding...hope she wun c this...though act like sua ba but still cute le...much cuter than b4...n pretty oso...of coz le my sis ma...haha....now only realise nick actually kinda pei wif ct wan la...if she continues this sua ba heng...coz both oso sua ba...then ma tian sheng yi dui lo...haha...(tok ct again...=P) so long never meet nick d...not really long act...juz met her during canteen day...but juz talk for a while only...kinda pai seh...but now recall oso felt nth wan...mayb i too sensitive liao...but still feel like laughing when recallin her action juz now...wonder where she goin...710 bus n a big bag...is it hers?? Dunno wor... hchee sms-ed...haha she very cute but sometimes kinda/// wan...asking those stupid q...she asked when did i start writing diary wan...recently...for ur info...n she even asked how we become frens wan...how i noe le...so /// q...how to answer...she seem to b looking for topics to chat bout...but really nth to talk...meet everyday...talk oso bout all those mou liew thing...but nvm le...hp still got money....after chattin wif hchee...chien miss called...then he sms-ed n ask whether i now who is tat anot...aiyo tot i stupid wan meh...miss call so many times liao still dunno meh...act he never tell me b4...juz miss call n forward msg...he ask how i noe since he never tell...he tot twah told me...not la...i din noe it was his num act...tat time kinda fed up y this fella kept miss callin wan...but later found out it was his num from twah’s hp then not tat hateful liao...i din yi mao qu ren leh...though his zhang xiang bao qian...i think i tok him oso nvm wan la...he wun c this wan haha... aiyo dunno y face so many so called pimples thing...haih...mayb it's balasan for teasing cteng too much...next time dare not to tease her anymore liao.... aft doin this only lo...thinking of our 4 ppl’s blog’s name...bout friendship...best buddy? Frens 4eva?? No idea....think 1st la...so many thing to consider...username la...title la...description la...password la...ooo password nonit...coz alredi got the damn stupid but funny password...not goin to say it out...aiyo think bout tat later la...now very sleepy...zzZZZ....
